meaningMnemonic: The の is there to indicate that it is the difference of something. For example this is like saying "the <vocabulary>separate</vocabulary> ______" or "the <vocabulary>different</vocabulary> _____" or "<vocabulary>another</vocabulary> ______". 別 by itself just means separate, different, or another.
readingMnemonic: The reading is the same as the one you learned. Move on to a 別の漢字, ok?
